ygData.subject: Re: Hey all

Yes, sadly we dropped the Gladiator: Beyond Freedom version when we all
started ending up at different game companies.  That's why it's been
extra fun watching the Snowstorm guys work with OpenGlad, to see people
take our old code and make something new with it.  And looking at some
of that old code really makes me shudder, too :)

--Tom

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "ktcobra" <ktcobra@...> wrote:
>
> Wow.  Sounds interesting.  I'll be very interested in seeing that.
> Gladiator 2 was something they were working on for a little while.
> Apparently it didn't even make it to beta stage... I guess.  I wish
> they would have been able to finish it, but... oh well. :(
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
